EmailTemplate.name: 12DecWeb-ACA.Invite 3
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, reminder for tomorrow's ACA webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: There's still time to join us on Thursday, December 12 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "The Affordable Care Act: What Independent Workers Need to Know <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2013/affordable-care-act-what-independent-workers-need-know>." MBO CEO Gene Zaino and VP of Business Development Dave Putt will discuss how the new policies in the ACA (also known as Obamacare) will affect you and your solo business. Register today <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2013/affordable-care-act-what-independent-workers-need-know>! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
